getValue

public final java.lang.Object getValue()
Gets the data model being used by this palette section. The specific model class is org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.model.CollectionModel. You may also use other model instances, e.g., java.util.List , array, and javax.faces.model.DataModel. The data layer will automatically convert the instance into a CollectionModel.

Specified by:
getValue in class org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.component.UIXCollection
Returns:
data model used by this data layer

setValue

public final void setValue(java.lang.Object value)
Sets the data model being used by this palette section. The specific model class is org.apache.myfaces.trinidad.model.CollectionModel. You may also use other model instances, e.g., java.util.List , array, and javax.faces.model.DataModel. The data layer will automatically convert the instance into a CollectionModel.

Parameters:
value - data model used by this data layer
